page.title: 14AT SCHOOL
page.content: (Ruth, age 12): My school is Eastbury Comprehensive. School starts at 9.15 a.m. and ends at 3.40 p.m. I like Tuesday best because we have a very easy day. We have French and English for 30 minutes each, then Art for an hour and Woodwork and Geography for an hour each. I like Woodwork best because I like to build things with my hands. I don't like Art much because I'm not very good at it. Other subjects we do in the week are:- Science, Mathematics, Needlework, P.E., Metalwork, History and Design. We also have a Year Period each week on Monday afternoon. Our Year Head talks to us then, or he might show us a film or bring a guest speaker.
